Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored in the opening minute.
Federico Dimarco equalized for Italy after 30 minutes.
Davide Frattesi put Italy ahead after 55 minutes.
Giacomo Raspadori secured the win for Italy in the 74th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Italy manager Luciano Spalletti praised Tonali's performance.
Spalletti mentioned Tonali's impact despite the latter serving a 10-month ban.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Parc des Princes in Paris.
The scoreline was 3-1 in favor of Italy.
France was leading after 12 seconds with a goal from Barcola.
